description: An HMC template to deploy a k0s cluster on AWS with bootstrapped control plane nodes.

controlPlaneNumber.description: The number of the control plane machines

workersNumber.description: The number of the worker machines

region.description: AWS region to deploy the cluster in

sshKeyName.description: The name of the key pair to securely connect to your instances. Valid values are empty string (do not use SSH keys), a valid SSH key name, or omitted (use the default SSH key name)

publicIP.description: Specifies whether the instance should get a public IP

bastion.description: The configuration of the bastion host

controlPlane.description: The configuration of the control plane machines

amiID.description: The ID of Amazon Machine Image

iamInstanceProfile.description: The name of an IAM instance profile to assign to the instance

instanceType.description: The type of instance to create

additionalSecurityGroupIDs.description: An array of references to security groups that should be applied to the instance

rootVolumeSize.description: The size of the root volume of the instance (GB)

format.description: Format string which will be used for image lookup

org.description: AWS org ID which owns the AMI

baseOS.description: OS name which can be used in format string
